title: Hex Dots
intro: Hex Dots is a puzzle game I made using Phaser.io, an HTML5 game framework. The game is based on Dots, but I changed it up by using a hexagonal grid instead of orthogonal. I built the game to be performant on browsers and added animations to give the game a satisfying feel.

title: Stick Fighter
intro: Stick Fighter is an online multiplayer game that I built from the ground up using JavaScript, Express, and Socket.io. I wrote the game engine, client, animations, and hitbox detection. The game uses an authoritative server, which means all the game logic runs on the server; the client only reads input and displays gamestate.

title: Street Fighter VR
intro: Street Fighter VR is an online multiplayer VR fighting game made with Unity. Motion-controlled attacks immerse the player in the combat. You can play as two characters with unique movesets. Features custom-made music and voice acting.

title: Pointer Mace
intro: Pointer Mace was built around one simple idea: hitting stuff with a mace is really fun! The goal of the game is to survive for as long as you can while protecting your meat!

title: Jet Spaceman
intro: Jet Spaceman is a game based on arcade space shooters that I liked as a kid. Alien-blasting, bullet dodging fun!

title: Duckoman
intro: Duckoman was one of the first games I made using Unity. You play as a duck and you battle robots!
